"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b11db63687219b300040c#post_557b11db63687219b300040c
Get some asparagus, on top of that put a salmon fillet, put some pepper, a pat of butter and a lemon slice on too, wrap it in tin foil and put it on a pan and cook on about 350 for about 20 or 30 minutes until it's nice and tender

It's _reeeeally_ good with sriracha.
